english_example_sentence: If they had not learned discipline early, they would have struggled with their careers
russian_example_sentence: Если бы они не выучили дисциплину рано, они бы боролись со своей карьерой
turkish_example_sentence: Onlar erken disiplini öğrenmemiş olsalar, kariyerlerinde zorluk çekerlerdi
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Onlar erken disiplini ______, kariyerlerinde zorluk çekerlerdi
